title: SpanishBitcoin
author: SpanishBitcoin
content: I want to invest in Nicaragua & Costa Rica.I'm looking to hire a local to check out properties and help coordinate with me.  Please email me at SpanishBitcoin@skiff.com

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: SpanishBitcoin on August 11, 2023, 04:07:07 PMI want to invest in Nicaragua & Costa Rica.I'm looking to hire a local to check out properties and help coordinate with me.  Please email me at SpanishBitcoin@skiff.comWelcome to the board but most times, I always feel very skeptical  about post like this and since there is no limits to how much a user can post on the forum,  I think it will be wise and safer if all discussions are been maintained on this thread rather than wanting an email to be sent with regards to the fact that you're still very new over here and not everyone would want to freely transact with you except is a scammer.Well I don't know why you choose this two places but I think there sre several opportunities  here in my country and in my local government and if you'll love to invest in properties, I would  advice you buy lands cheaper over here and I will be willing  to help you sort  a little more cheaper lands that have the potential of doubling it's price in two years or more or even lesser.I'm open for discussion  and I think I'm very much ok keeping every discussion  open on the thread to maintain transparency.

comments.author: SpanishBitcoin
comments.body: Ridiculous, I'm looking to pay to have anyone who speaks Spanish look at properties for me.  It wouldn’t make sense to do this out in the open listing addresses.Your avatar has an illegal mixer in it... so you'd be the shady one
